org.springframework.data.repository.query.spi

接口 EvaluationContextExtension

  • 所有已知实现类:
    EvaluationContextExtensionSupport

    public interface EvaluationContextExtension
    SPI to allow adding a set of properties and function definitions accessible via the root of an EvaluationContext provided by a ExtensionAwareEvaluationContextProvider.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.9

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      String getExtensionId()
      Returns the identifier of the extension.
      Map<String,Function> getFunctions()
      Returns the functions exposed by the extension.
      Map<String,Object> getProperties()
      Returns the properties exposed by the extension.
      Object getRootObject()
      Returns the root object to be exposed by the extension.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getExtensionId

        String getExtensionId()
        Returns the identifier of the extension. The id can be leveraged by users to fully qualify property lookups and thus overcome ambiguities in case multiple extensions expose properties with the same name.
        返回:
        the extension id, must not be null.

      • getProperties

        Map<String,Object> getProperties()
        Returns the properties exposed by the extension.
        返回:
        the properties

      • getFunctions

        Map<String,Function> getFunctions()
        Returns the functions exposed by the extension.
        返回:
        the functions

      • getRootObject

        @Nullable
Object getRootObject()
        Returns the root object to be exposed by the extension. It's strongly recommended to declare the most concrete type possible as return type of the implementation method. This will allow us to obtain the necessary metadata once and not for every evaluation.
        返回:
